subject: Football
Rescues
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Two N.F.L. players may have died just a few hours after the fishing boat they were in overturned in rough water, possibly before rescuers were even alerted that they and two others were lost off the west coast of Florida, according to Coast Guard records. In a 23-page report provided under a Freedom of Information Act request, the Coast Guard documented two conversations it had with Nick Schuyler, a former University of South Florida player who was the lone survivor.
